p: In addition, trans-anethole, the main component of the essential oil, was examined for its cytotoxicity in RC-37 cells. Its IC 50 value was 100 mg L âˆ’1 [ 56]. The incubation of hepatocytes with anethole caused a cell death accompanied by losses of cellular ATP and adenine nucleotide pools [ 57]. Anethole shows apoptotic activity, as it can damage DNA [ 58]. Thus anethole could be responsible for the overall cytotoxicity of the essential oil in our study.
